data.title: Yellow Line Metro stations
data.meta_description: Explore all Yellow Line Metro stations in details and filter the station based on the your looking facilities.
data.text: This upcoming yellow line is a proud addition to the Namma Bengaluru Network. It will stretch from RV Road to Bommasandra, linking South Bengaluru to the Central and North parts of the city. Spanning 19 km stretch and boasting 16 elevated metro stations, it promises to be a game changer upon its opening in December 2024.
